content.text: Velvét, the luxury all-season clothing brand led by Ritvik Sharma, has clinched the prestigious 2025 Global Design Excellence Award in Paris, marking a significant milestone in the brand’s journey. Known for its innovative designs, impeccable craftsmanship, and dedication to sustainability, Velvét continues to push the boundaries of luxury fashion, and this recognition cements its place at the forefront of the fashion world. The award was presented during a glamorous ceremony in Paris, where leading designers, fashion icons, and industry experts gathered to celebrate the best in global design.
A New Standard in Timeless Elegance

Judges at the Global Design Excellence Award were unanimous in their praise for Velvét’s unique fusion of modern tailoring and sustainable craftsmanship. The brand’s ability to seamlessly blend traditional techniques with forward-thinking, eco-friendly practices was seen as a game-changer in the industry. Velvét’s designs are characterized by their timeless elegance — clothing that transcends trends and seasons. This approach has set a new benchmark for luxury fashion, one that prioritizes longevity over short-lived fads. Ritvik Sharma’s vision of creating all-season wardrobes that offer both aesthetic appeal and functionality has made Velvét an industry leader in the field of sustainable luxury.

The collection that earned Velvét this esteemed award is a testament to Sharma’s relentless pursuit of perfection. Each piece is crafted with care, using only the finest sustainable materials such as organic cotton, recycled fabrics, and ethically sourced leather. Velvét’s commitment to sustainability is not just a buzzword, but a core principle that guides every aspect of the brand’s production process. From low-impact dyes to energy-efficient manufacturing, Velvét is redefining what it means to be a luxury brand in the modern world.

Sharma’s design philosophy centers around the idea that true luxury should be timeless. Rather than chasing fleeting trends, Velvét focuses on creating pieces that are not only of superior quality but also have lasting value. This vision has resonated with fashion-forward consumers who are increasingly seeking out brands that align with their values — brands that prioritize sustainability, ethics, and longevity. With the recognition at the 2025 Global Design Excellence Awards, Velvét’s commitment to these principles has been validated on the world stage.

Speaking at the ceremony, Ritvik Sharma expressed his gratitude and pride in receiving such a prestigious honor. 'This award reflects our commitment to quality, sustainability, and the art of refined dressing. Velvét stands for more than fashion — it's an experience,' Sharma said. 'From the fabric we choose to the care we put into every stitch, each piece is a reflection of our passion for craftsmanship and the timeless elegance we aspire to achieve.' These words encapsulate the essence of Velvét — a brand that is dedicated not just to making clothes but to creating meaningful experiences for its customers.

The Global Design Excellence Award is just the latest in a series of accolades that Velvét has received for its pioneering approach to fashion. In the past few years, the brand has grown from a niche luxury label into a global powerhouse known for its exquisite designs, attention to detail, and forward-thinking approach to sustainability. This award is a recognition of the brand’s ongoing evolution and its unwavering commitment to creating fashion that is both luxurious and responsible.

The award also highlights the growing importance of sustainability in the luxury fashion industry. As consumers become more conscious of the environmental impact of their purchases, brands like Velvét are leading the way in demonstrating that luxury can coexist with sustainability. By prioritizing eco-friendly materials and ethical production practices, Velvét is proving that style and sustainability are not mutually exclusive — they are, in fact, complementary.

As the fashion world continues to evolve, Velvét remains at the cutting edge, shaping the future of luxury fashion. The brand’s success at the 2025 Global Design Excellence Awards is a clear indication that its vision is resonating with consumers and industry experts alike. Looking ahead, Velvét is poised to continue redefining the standards of luxury, with a focus on sustainability, craftsmanship, and timeless elegance.

The recognition at this prestigious event marks a turning point for Velvét, affirming that the brand's innovative approach to design is not only making an impact but also shaping the future of the luxury fashion industry. As Ritvik Sharma continues to push the boundaries of what is possible in design, Velvét’s influence will undoubtedly continue to grow, setting new standards for both sustainability and style.
